service.query: --- 사용안함 SELECT A.STR_CD , A.POS_NO , A.TRAN_NO , CASE A.TRAN_TYPE WHEN '0' THEN '일반' WHEN '1' THEN '외상' WHEN '2' THEN '미결' WHEN '3' THEN '임대매출' WHEN '8' THEN '입출금' WHEN '9' THEN '기타' END AS TRAN_TYPE , CASE A.TRAN_MODE WHEN '01' THEN '매출거래' WHEN '11' THEN '사용' WHEN '21' THEN '주문발생' WHEN '22' THEN '주문결말' WHEN '23' THEN 'COD발생' WHEN '24' THEN 'COD결말' WHEN '25' THEN '특판발생' WHEN '26' THEN '특판결말' WHEN '31' THEN '임대외상' WHEN '81' THEN '준비금' WHEN '82' THEN '중간입금' WHEN '83' THEN 'PDA 입금' WHEN '84' THEN '상품권환전' WHEN '85' THEN '마감입금' WHEN '91' THEN '정산' WHEN '92' THEN '일괄취소' WHEN '93' THEN '포인트적립' WHEN '94' THEN '상품교환' WHEN '95' THEN '재고조사' WHEN '96' THEN 'OK캐쉬백적립' END AS TRAN_MODE , DECODE(A.TRAN_FLAG, '0', '정상', DECODE(A.TRAN_FLAG, '1', '반품', '오타')) AS TRAN_FLAG , DECODE(A.TRAN_MODE,'92','0',DECODE(A.TRAN_FLAG, '0', MAX(NVL(A.SALE_TOT_AMT,0)), MAX(NVL(A.SALE_TOT_AMT,0))*-1)) AS SALE_TOT_AMT , DECODE(A.TRAN_FLAG, '0', MAX(NVL(A.REDU_TOT_AMT,0)), MAX(NVL(A.REDU_TOT_AMT,0))*-1) AS REDO_TOT_AMT , DECODE(A.TRAN_FLAG, '0', MAX(NVL(A.SALE_TOT_AMT,0)), MAX(NVL(A.SALE_TOT_AMT,0))*-1) - DECODE(A.TRAN_FLAG, '0', MAX(NVL(A.REDU_TOT_AMT,0)), MAX(NVL(A.REDU_TOT_AMT,0))*-1) AS SALE_AMT , DECODE(A.TRAN_FLAG, '0', MAX(NVL(A.DC_TOT_AMT ,0)), MAX(NVL(A.DC_TOT_AMT ,0))*-1) AS DC_TOT_AMT , DECODE(A.TRAN_FLAG, '0', MAX(NVL(A.SALE_TOT_AMT,0)), MAX(NVL(A.SALE_TOT_AMT,0))*-1) - DECODE(A.TRAN_FLAG, '0', MAX(NVL(A.REDU_TOT_AMT,0)), MAX(NVL(A.REDU_TOT_AMT,0))*-1) - DECODE(A.TRAN_FLAG, '0', MAX(NVL(A.DC_TOT_AMT ,0)), MAX(NVL(A.DC_TOT_AMT ,0))*-1) AS REAL_SALE_AMT , MAX(CASE WHEN C.PAY_TYPE IN('00') THEN -- DECODE(A.TRAN_FLAG, '0', NVL(C.PAY_AMT, 0), NVL(C.PAY_AMT, 0)* -1) 'Y' ELSE -- 0 'N' END) AS CASH_TOT_AMT , MAX(CASE WHEN C.PAY_TYPE IN ('10', '12', '13') THEN --DECODE(A.TRAN_FLAG, '0', NVL(C.PAY_AMT, 0), NVL(C.PAY_AMT, 0)* -1) 'Y' ELSE --0 'N' END) AS CARD_AMT , MAX(CASE WHEN C.PAY_TYPE IN ('20', '21', '22') THEN --DECODE(A.TRAN_FLAG, '0', NVL(C.PAY_AMT, 0), NVL(C.PAY_AMT, 0)* -1) 'Y' ELSE --0 'N' END) AS GIFT_AMT , MAX(CASE WHEN C.PAY_TYPE IN ('30', '31', '32', '33') THEN --DECODE(A.TRAN_FLAG, '0', NVL(C.PAY_AMT, 0), NVL(C.PAY_AMT, 0)* -1) 'Y' ELSE --0 'N' END) AS CUPON_AMT , MAX(CASE WHEN C.PAY_TYPE IN ('41') THEN --DECODE(A.TRAN_FLAG, '0', NVL(C.PAY_AMT, 0), NVL(C.PAY_AMT, 0)* -1) 'Y' ELSE --0 'N' END) AS OKCASHBAG_AMT , A.SALE_DT FROM DPS.PS_TRHEADER A , DPS.PC_POSMST B , (SELECT STR_CD , SALE_DT , POS_NO , TRAN_NO , PAY_TYPE , PAY_AMT FROM DPS.PS_TRPAID WHERE STR_CD = ? AND SALE_DT = ? ) C WHERE B.STR_CD = A.STR_CD AND B.POS_NO = A.POS_NO AND B.POS_FLAG LIKE ? || '%' AND C.STR_CD (+)= A.STR_CD AND C.POS_NO (+)= A.POS_NO AND C.SALE_DT (+)= A. SALE_DT AND C.TRAN_NO (+)= A.TRAN_NO AND A.STR_CD = ? AND A.SALE_DT = ? AND A.POS_NO >= ? AND A.POS_NO <= ? AND A.SALE_USER_ID LIKE ? || '%' AND A.TRAN_NO >= ? AND A.TRAN_NO <= ? AND A.SALE_TOT_AMT >= ? AND A.SALE_TOT_AMT <= ? AND ( ('0' = ? AND C.PAY_TYPE LIKE '0' ||'%' ) OR ('1' = ? AND C.PAY_TYPE LIKE '1' ||'%' ) OR ('2' = ? AND C.PAY_TYPE = '20') OR ('3' = ? AND C.PAY_TYPE LIKE '3' || '%') OR ('4' = ? AND C.PAY_TYPE IN ('21','22')) OR ('5' = ? AND C.PAY_TYPE IN ('41')) OR ('%' = ? AND 1=1) ) -- %:전체 0:현금 1:카드 2:자사상품권 3:쿠폰 4:타사상품권 5:OK캐쉬백 GROUP BY A.STR_CD , A.SALE_DT , A.POS_NO , A.TRAN_NO , A.TRAN_TYPE , A.TRAN_MODE , A.TRAN_FLAG ORDER BY STR_CD , POS_NO , TRAN_NO

SELECT STR_CD -- 점코드 , SALE_DT -- 매출일자 , POS_NO -- pos번호 , (SELECT POS_NAME FROM DPS.PC_POSMST WHERE STR_CD = A.STR_CD AND POS_NO = A.POS_NO ) POS_NM -- POS명 , TRAN_NO -- 거래번호 , MIN(SIGN) TRAN_FLAG -- 거래구분(정상/취소) , SUM(AMT) SALE_TOT_AMT -- 총매출액 , SUM(DECODE(PAY_TYPE,'00',AMT,0)) CASH_TOT_AMT -- 현금 , SUM(DECODE(PAY_TYPE,'10',AMT,'13',AMT,0)) CARD_AMT -- 카드 (은련 포함) , SUM(DECODE(PAY_TYPE,'20',AMT,0)) GIFT_AMT -- 자사 , SUM(DECODE(PAY_TYPE,'21',AMT,0)) CUPON_AMT -- 타사 , SUM(DECODE(PAY_TYPE,'61',AMT,0)) OKCASHBAG_AMT -- 외상매출 FROM ( SELECT I.STR_CD , I.SALE_DT , I.POS_NO , I.TRAN_NO , DECODE(H.TRAN_FLAG,0,'정상','취소') SIGN , I.PAY_TYPE , I.PAY_AMT * DECODE(H.TRAN_FLAG,0,1,-1) AMT FROM POS.TR_PAID I, POS.TR_HEADER H WHERE I.STR_CD = H.STR_CD AND I.SALE_DT = H.SALE_DT AND I.POS_NO = H.POS_NO AND I.TRAN_NO = H.TRAN_NO AND I.STR_CD = ? AND I.SALE_DT = ? AND I.POS_NO BETWEEN ? AND ? AND I.POS_NO IN ( SELECT POS_NO FROM DPS.PC_POSMST WHERE USE_YN='Y' ) AND I.TRAN_NO BETWEEN ? AND ? AND H.REJCT_FLAG <>'1' ) A GROUP BY STR_CD,SALE_DT, POS_NO, TRAN_NO HAVING SUM(AMT) BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY STR_CD,SALE_DT, POS_NO, TRAN_NO
SELECT E_JNL FROM DPS.PS_TREJNL WHERE STR_CD = ? AND SALE_DT = ? AND POS_NO = ? AND TRAN_NO = ?
SELECT A.POS_NO FROM DPS.PC_POSMST A WHERE A.POS_NO = ?

SELECT MAX(A.POSNO_MIN) AS POSNO_MIN , MAX(A.POSNO_MAX) AS POSNO_MAX FROM ( SELECT MIN(A.POS_NO) AS POSNO_MIN , '' AS POSNO_MAX FROM DPS.PC_POSMST A
UNION ALL
SELECT '' AS POSNO_MIN , MAX(A.POS_NO) AS POSNO_MAX FROM DPS.PC_POSMST A ) A
